summary: The peaceful cohabitation of two 30-something bachelors is disrupted when they both fall in love with the charming young woman who moves in with them.
cast: Ilker Aksum|Fatih Al|Gunes Sayin|Taner Birsel|Baki Davrak|Mehmet Ali Nuroglu|Beril Boz|Damla Kabakci|Durak Bulbuk|Tamer Yurtbasi|Meliha Corek|Ilker Burma|Selim Gürata|Mustafa Gökpinar
title: Bizim Büyük Çaresizligimiz
